affiliation: Pubic Sector Community Manager, OSU Open Source Lab
name: Deborah Bryant
biography: Deborah Bryant is Public Sector Communities Manager at Oregon State University’s Open Source Lab (OSUOSL.org), where she brings together public, private and academic concerns in pursuit of the successful adoption of open source technology and collaboration models. She directs the annual Government Open Source Conference (GOSCON.org), founded in 2005 as a platform for education and collaboration amongst government IT management at all levels of government.
